name: wordpress-docker-dind
description: WordPress Docker-in-Docker environment for hosting multiple WordPress instances with network isolation and easy management

scripts.setup: npm run build:images && npm run install:cli
scripts.install:cli: cd cli-tool && npm install && npm install -g .
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.rebuild: npm run stop && npm run build:images && npm run start
scripts.validate:env: node -e "require('fs').accessSync('.env', require('fs').constants.R_OK); console.log('.env file exists and is readable')"
scripts.postinstall:
echo '

Next steps:
1. Run: npm run init:env (if .env does not exist)
2. Edit .env file with your configuration
3. Run: npm run setup
4. Run: npm start

For more information, see README.md
'
